Wondermade Website

Wondermade is a new confectionary in Orlando, FL focused on superior marshmallows in a variety of flavors including blueberry, pumpkin, and Guinness. The company approached me to design an e-commerce site to sell their marshmallows. Working off the existing branding (from The Heads of State), we created a fun, textured site that reflects the packaging and echoes the unboxing experiences.

  • Design
  • Interactive
  • Interface Design
